name: ERGEI HCHIPANOV
summary: I am a Software Engineer with 6+ years experience in development and design on a wide technological stack. My main proficiency is building high-load Java backends. I design and build critical parts for core business applications such as integration buses, CI/CD and infrastructure applications. Looking for the Senior Software Engineer position.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Working on business-critical software projects across a wide technology stack including Java, TypeScript, Spring/Spring Boot, Node.js, Apache Kafka; VoIP; CI/CD with CircleCI; Git.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Backend design for telecom customer-support software; Docker, Jenkins, Perforce; Couchbase, PostgreSQL.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Built backend for customer UI used in top-3 telecom carriers; performed multiple infrastructure updates including configuration management, edge interfaces and API redesign; technologies included Java, Spring, Docker, Jenkins, TeamCity, MongoDB.

experience.title: Java Developer
experience.description: Member of core service bus development team; Java, Spring, Red Hat Fuse, Jenkins.

experience.title: Java Developer
experience.description: Developed visual database query builder and related tools; Java, Eclipse.
